entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Inheritance Margin #75861
  • Area - Convert Anonymous Type to Tuple #75859
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Suppression #75858
  • Area - Inline Method #75856
  • Area - Use Object Initializer #75855
  • Deconstruct receiver ref escape is not considered #75850

Closed

  • Targeting IDE layer projects to .Net Core #45534
    18.0
  • Hovering the dotted vertical line doesn't show namespace for file-scoped namespaces #54740
    Backlog
  • Multiline Comments in C# violate LF line ending of file #54261
    Backlog
  • Go To Definition does not work correctly with delegate and operator #36377
    Backlog
  • IDE shows warnings for invalid code that isn't bound in a ref-only build #54141
    Backlog
  • RenameTracking encountered an error #54124
    Backlog
  • Add code style to sort members by accessibility #54097
    Backlog
  • Incorrect syntax error squiggle in interactive window #53787
    Backlog
  • IDE0079 doesn't show up in VS #52984
    Backlog
  • Code Action menu takes too long to show up #52952
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Server should handle URIs with escaped colons #52606
    Backlog
  • Consider C# Using Directives options when copying and pasting types and "usings" automatically added #52495
    Backlog
  • Some new attributes to mandatory the class to implement the specified static member. #52459
    Backlog
  • [EditorConfig UI] Allow to configuring an entire category of analyzers #52388
    Backlog
  • IDE0066 code fix should support unconditional preprocessor directives #52307
    Backlog
  • Doc comment auto-inserted in verbatim strings with preceding tag #49564
    Backlog
  • Inline type hints jump disruptively #51842
    18.0
  • C# Source Generator - The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #75679
  • EditorBrowsable on internal members #51269
    Backlog
  • Usage of explicit operator is not found #50850
    Backlog
  • Avoid converting line to string in TextLineExtension helpers #50706
    Backlog
  • Badly formatted label in "Preview Changes" dialog UI #50681
    Backlog
  • Support nested calls during an active argument completion session #50637
    Backlog
  • Handle Signature Help / argument completion mismatched symbols #50636
    Backlog
  • Support Undo in argument value completion #50635
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Code style rule to allow dedented comments #50631
    Backlog
  • Completion of property patterns doesn't add the colon #50570
    Backlog
  • Convert tuple does not change camelCase element names to PascalCase field names #50505
    Backlog
  • Display 'if else' structure better in structure guidelines #50503
    Backlog
  • Code Analysis Should Not Include GlobalSuppressions.cs #50233
  • Make IEditorFormattingService public #50221
    Backlog
  • Reporting some minor bugs in visual studio #49965
    Backlog
  • IDE0079 is too noisy for cross-targeting projects #49925
    Backlog
  • Provide code-fix for IDE0060 #49868
    Backlog
  • The IDE should generate code at the cursor's position and not at the end of the file #49858
    Backlog
  • Feature: Allow formatted content in description window #49867
    Backlog
  • VS error list often populates with warnings despite suppression by .editorconfig #49718
    Backlog
  • The <see> xml doc tag doesn't create a link in Object Browser #49651
    Backlog
  • Show an indicator when import completion items not included due to cold cache #44175
    Backlog
  • Source Generators: generated file appears empty after re-opening the solution #49521
    Backlog
  • When there is no “using” statement in the class it is introducing a blank new line after namespace causing SA1505 #49497
    Backlog
  • Add metadata to copy inside the editor #49442
    Backlog
  • Offer 'ToDictionary' instead of inserting explicit cast #49208
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator.MethodDeclaration should support generating abstract/extern methods #49192
    Backlog
  • Make `IWorkspaceStatusService.IsFullyLoadedAsync` synchronous #49114
    Backlog
  • intellisense does not show base class library while typing in XML comments #49078
    Backlog
  • [loc] Update comments in XLF #49058
    Backlog
  • Automatically fix curly quotes copy paste #49018
    Backlog
  • Does FileChangeWatcher have a memory leak in its Task continuation chain? #48938
    Backlog
  • IDE code style options should have `hidden` severity by default #48839
    Backlog
  • Convert to switch expression produces wrong code #48829
    Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic line commit hangs the editor while typing #48590
    Backlog
  • Improve F1 help for tokens with multiple uses #48392
    Backlog
  • Ensure that source generators work with Source Browser and/or Rich Navigation #48123
    Backlog
  • Implement hash-resistent equality comparers for types with custom MessagePack serialization #48119
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio does not reload source generator assemblies when they change on disk #48083
    Backlog
  • Supported API warning doesn't work on overloads #48058
    Backlog
  • Move method to partial #48026
    Backlog
  • When invoking a method: optionally automatically fill in argument names & create local variables for them. #48019
    Backlog
  • Upgrade Project fixer should be able to upgrade TargetFramework to support new language versions #47977
    Backlog
  • Replace ObjectReader/Writer with MessagePack serialization when serializing assets #47861
    Backlog
  • Future potential user experience improvements with soft-errors #47849
    Backlog
  • IDE0066 produces (arguably) less readable code for enums when changing to switch expression using or patterns #47521
    Backlog
  • RenameDocument does not fire IVSRefactorNotify or dismiss rename tracking #47048
    Backlog
  • No intellisense for record types if they're declared at the end of a top level program #47042
    17.6 P3
  • Show items from unimported namespaces shows types that are invalid given signature constraints #46768
    Backlog
  • Completion matching does not support abbreviated identifiers #46677
    Backlog
  • Show/Hide member attributes #46633
    Backlog
  • Revisit exclusion of IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter from VisualStudioTestCompositions.LanguageServices #46380
    Backlog
  • In foreach loops, automatically (in debug) add variables that would give iteration # and total iterations planned #46272
    Backlog
  • Consider making `QuickInfoSection.NullabilityAnalysis` public #46254
    Backlog
  • RenameTestHelpers.CreateWorkspaceWithWaiter ignores TestHost parameter value #45890
    Backlog
  • Opening 'Quick Actions' gets unusably slow when file has large number of compile errors #45836
    Backlog
  • Introduce local refactoring generates incorrect code #45790
    Backlog
  • Using `.WithProjectName()` only followed by `MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges(newSolution)` does not update `Workspace.CurrentSolution` #45710
    Backlog
  • Include implicitly called methods (e.g. an overloaded "ToString()") in the CodeLens reference count #45631
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Allow more code actions to execute on client via WorkspaceEdit once LSP bug is fixed #45623
    Backlog
  • Completion isn't triggered automatically for generic methods #45107
    Backlog
  • RenameDocumentAsync() should return error when invalid characters. #44515
    Backlog
  • Add code snippet "cr" for Console.ReadLine(); #44499
    Backlog
  • InlineDeclaration doesn't trigger on top-level statement #44429
    Backlog
  • Handle FAR/Inline rename for references in global suppression parameters #44401
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in CSharpCodeGenerationService.AddStatementsWorker() with top-level statements #44387
    Backlog
  • Intellisense listing members for wrong class inside lambda (VS 2019 16.5.5) #44248
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense is defaulting to the incorrect value when inside a Lambda Expression #44182
    Backlog
  • Codegen for spreading a null array does not throw NullReferenceException #74668

PullRequests

Created

  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Fix formatting of simplify-linq-expression #75860
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make VBCSCompiler pipe name insensitive to casing of the path #75852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move HasHome out of Binder #75851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue where doc comment completion was coming up inside a string literal #75857
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Re-add the IEntryPointFinderService. It is used through IVT #75854
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Optimize single spread of IEnumerable to array #75847
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update parsing code for conditional access expressions #75849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create features/DictionaryExpression branch and resurrect parsing for those expressions #75846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow escaping refs to implicit rvalue temporaries #75830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, VSCode
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
